column2: Federation of Malaya - Report of the Constituency Delineation Commission (1954), Tindak Malaysia (2023), The Straits Times, 16 June 1955 Page 2

All the percentages for electoral demographics are calculated by Tindak Malaysia using Straits Times. Ethnic composition data from Straits Times have accuracy issues for the constituencies of Wellesley South, Malacca Central,Malacca Luar, Krian, Batang Padang, Larut and Matang, Ipoh and Menglembu and Trengganu Utara. There is no official ethnic demographic data. Sum of percentages for electoral demographics may not attain exact 100% but the variation is kept less than 2%. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives
